original_title: 裸よりも恥ずかしい教育実習生の肌に吸い付くマキシワンピ授業
overview: Hayano Uta is a teacher who was having an affair with one of her much younger students. Fucking carelessly in the school, it was a matter of time getting caught. Plus now she is getting blackmailed by another student.  She was forced to wear a very embarrassing maxi dress to teach in school. Yes! A maxidress and no underwear. All the boys in the school went nuts and she basically couldn’t refuse.  A god damn maxidress. Amazing.
title: She wears A Tight Maxi One-Piece Dress That Slurp Her Body, More Embarrassing Than Naked, And That’s How She teaches now. Uta Hayano
